body_html: Similar thing is already being done with TensorFlow's caching allocator already. You may see __LOG_MEMORY__ messages suggesting memory allocations, but those allocations are near instantaneous when they reuse memory that tensorflow allocated earlier
body_text: Similar thing is already being done with TensorFlow's caching allocator already. You may see __LOG_MEMORY__ messages suggesting memory allocations, but those allocations are near instantaneous when they reuse memory that tensorflow allocated earlier
body: Similar thing is already being done with TensorFlow's caching allocator already. You may see `__LOG_MEMORY__` messages suggesting memory allocations, but those allocations are near instantaneous when they reuse memory that tensorflow allocated earlier
